mapper.sql: SELECT a.order_status, b.order_seq, b.op_count, b.created_at, c.product_name, c.product_info, c.product_cost, d.image_name FROM tbl_order a, tbl_op b, tbl_product c, tbl_image d WHERE #{alias} = a.user_seq AND a.order_seq = b.order_seq AND b.product_seq = c.product_seq AND c.product_seq = d.product_seq AND d.image_type = 'MAIN' ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.order_status, a.order_total_cost, b.order_seq, b.op_count, b.created_at, c.product_name, c.product_info, d.image_name FROM tbl_order a, tbl_op b, tbl_product c, tbl_image d WHERE #{no} = a.user_seq AND a.order_seq = b.order_seq AND b.product_seq = c.product_seq AND c.product_seq = d.product_seq AND d.image_type = 'MAIN' ORDER BY created_at DESC)
AND TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{ordStrtDt} AND #{ordEndDt}
AND TO_DATE(sysdate-14) < created_at
AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{itemNm} || '%'

select * from (SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.order_status, a.order_total_cost, b.order_seq, b.op_count, b.created_at, c.product_name, c.product_info, d.image_name FROM tbl_order a, tbl_op b, tbl_product c, tbl_image d WHERE #{no} = a.user_seq AND a.order_seq = b.order_seq AND b.product_seq = c.product_seq AND c.product_seq = d.product_seq AND d.image_type = 'MAIN' ORDER BY created_at DESC) WHERE order_status = '주문취소' OR order_status = '교환접수' OR order_status = '교환완료' OR order_status = '반품접수' OR order_status = '반품완료')
AND TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{ordStrtDt} AND #{ordEndDt}
AND TO_DATE(sysdate-14) < created_at
AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{itemNm} || '%'

SELECT a.order_status, a.order_total_cost, a.order_user_name, a.order_point, b.order_seq, b.op_count, b.created_at, c.product_name, c.product_cost, c.product_info, d.image_name, e.user_address_name, e.user_address_phone_num, e.user_address_address1, e.user_address_address2, e.user_address_address3 FROM tbl_order a, tbl_op b, tbl_product c, tbl_image d, tbl_user_address e WHERE #{no} = a.user_seq AND #{odno} = a.order_seq AND a.order_seq = b.order_seq AND b.product_seq = c.product_seq AND c.product_seq = d.product_seq AND a.user_seq = e.user_seq

select b.coupon_name, b.coupon_ratio, b.coupon_cost, b.created_at, b.expired_date, b.expired_cost, TO_DATE(b.expired_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')-TO_DATE(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "lefttime" from tbl_cu a, tbl_coupon b where #{no} = a.user_seq and a.coupon_seq = b.coupon_seq

SELECT A.CREATED_AT, A.POINT_SAVE, A.POINT_USE, A.PRODUCT_SEQ, B.PRODUCT_NAME FROM TBL_POINT A, TBL_PRODUCT B WHERE A.USER_SEQ = #{no} AND A.PRODUCT_SEQ = B.PRODUCT_SEQ
AND TO_CHAR(A.CREATED_AT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{strtDt} AND #{endDt}
AND TO_DATE(sysdate-14) < A.CREATED_AT
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
